name: Assemble and DIE
description:
In a world where entertainment has grown stale, one show has grown to become the king of entertainment. Welcome to Assemble and DIE!

A game show where contestants are given resources to construct weapons, racing against the clock to fend for themselves against the unrelenting onslaught of the clone army.

So step up, shut up, strap on and GAME ON.

Built by Jacques Botha and Wogan May.

Theme: One Room

Diversifiers used:

  1. One weapon
  2. Darkness
  3. Count Down
  4. Michael Bay Mode
  5. Symmetry
  6. Bouncy Stuff
